name: Bird and Bard
description:
Bird and Bard is a short action-platformer about Minako, a swordsman, and Marcus, a bard-turned-fighter.

Features three, arcade-y levels, bird-keeping, and fast and fun combat where you can deflect the enemies' attacks back at them!

-------------

Developer's Note:

This game is a birthday present for my girlfriend, featuring her OC (Original Character) and mine. It was a barebones game back then, and I decided to keep working on it until it is in a completable and releasable state. 

That, and this is the first game I ever fully completed in Godot! Woo!

If you are interested in playing, thank you so much! Feedback is greatly appreciated, and even if I won't be working on this again for a bit of time, feedback is never taken for granted.
